markdownRemark.excerpt: Haskell alsa mixer binding to use with XMONAD cabal install —ghc-options=“-fPIC” alsa-mixer.cabal

Haskell alsa mixer binding to use with XMONAD

cabal install —ghc-options=“-fPIC” alsa-mixer.cabal
